test_case = int(input())
while test_case :
 n = int(input())
 array = list(map(int, input().strip().split()))
 
 array.sort(reverse = True)
 i = 0 
 s = 0

  s += array[i]
  i += 2 
 print(s)
 test_case -= 1

# cook your dish here
for _ in range(int(input())):
 n = int(input())
 lis = list(map(int,input().split()))
 lis.sort()
 chef = sum([lis[i] for i in range(0,n,2)])
 other = sum(lis[i] for i in range(1,n,2))
 print(max(chef,other))

 array.sort()

 stones1 = sum([array[i] for i in range(0, n, 2)])
 stones2 = sum([array[i] for i in range(1, n, 2)])
 print(max(stones2, stones1))

T = int(input())

for _ in range(T):

  count += A[i]
 ans.append(count)

for i in ans:

t = int(input())
while t > 0:
 n = int(input())
 li = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
 li.sort(reverse=True)
 c = 0
 for i in range(n):
  if i % 2 == 0:
   c += li[i]
 print(c)
 t = t - 1
